Can Indian Economy expect revival despite rising inflation? What do you think are the major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country?

The First major precaution step is controlling and storing the stock of consumer goods to control  the inflation . Imports goods has to be minimize . Natural resources has not to be decomposed, they has to be exist.

Controlling on demand and supply of the goods , maintain equilibrium between the demand and supply. Secondly controlling the corruption it also effects the Indian economy.
